1370: Atghardis was born in Tuytsteeg in 1370.
Got married to Amisius at age 22 in 1370.
Gave birth to Amisius in 1370 at age 22.
1374: Gave birth to Katerina in 1374 at age 26.
1377: Gave birth to Henric in 1377 at age 29.
1378: Gave birth to Natelien in 1378 at age 30.
1380: Gave birth to Albertus in 1380 at age 32.
Lost son Albertus when Albertus was 1 years old.
1381: Gave birth to Gobel in 1381 at age 33.
1382: Gave birth to Bobone in 1382 at age 34.
1385: Gave birth to Voghel in 1385 at age 37.
